articles.author: Richard Lawson
articles.title: 'Chess' Theater Review: Lea Michele in a Conflicted Broadway Revival - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: With music by ABBA’s Benny Andersson and Björn Ulvaeus, the 1988 show revolves around rival American and Soviet chess wizards and the woman caught between them.

articles.title: ‘Now You See Me 3’ races past ‘The Running Man’ at box office - AP News
